[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fgv/ts-res](./ts-res.md) &gt; [Resources](./ts-res.resources.md) &gt; [ResourceBuilder](./ts-res.resources.resourcebuilder.md)

## Resources.ResourceBuilder class

Represents a builder for a single logical [resource](./ts-res.resources.resource.md)<!-- -->. Collects candidates with a common resource ID, validates them against each other and builds a [resource](./ts-res.resources.resource.md) object once all candidates are collected.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ResourceBuilder 
```

</td><td>

`readonly`


</td><td>

[ResourceType](./ts-res.resourcetypes.resourcetype.md) \| undefined


</td><td>

Supplied or inferred [type](./ts-res.resourcetypes.resourcetype.md) of the resource being built. If no type is supplied, the type will be inferred from the candidates - at least one candidate must define resource type and all candidates must be of the same type.


</td></tr>
